title: chroma pack for zac
body: zac hasn't had a skin in 2 years, plus i think it'd look nice on zac. colours~~ anyways thats just something that popped up in my head.

replies.body: zac was the first champ to get a chroma
Give us pink Zac then we're off for a great start, imagine his player pool spike the very instant that thing is made available in shop.
inb4 special wep is a chroma
